modName: Dragonborn Tel Mithryn Food And Bed
summary: A new NPC is added in Tel Mithryn that sells food and a free bed to rest in Tel Mithryn.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds new NPC in Tel Mithryn that sells food and a free bed to rest in Tel Mithryn. This way you can now rest at every single town and settlement in Solstheim. You can find the new NPC and the bed in theÂ Tel Mithryn Tower. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1018?]here[/url]. Also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76040?]Skyrim More Inns[/url] mod.

Requirements
Skyrim
Dragonborn

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
